main event: An observer in Oak Grove, Oregon witnessed a bright, steady, reddish object in the sky that seemed to be accelerating in height before it disappeared after 30 minutes of observation.
interesting points: The object was observed to be bright and reddish in color., The duration of the observation was approximately 30 minutes., The object moved to the east before vanishing from sight., Physical evidence was reported in the sighting., The observer searched for the object after it disappeared but could not locate it again.
